title: 96/336/EC: Commission Decision of 6 May 1996 amending Decision 89/540/EEC on the organization of a temporary experiment on the marketing of seeds and propagating material (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 6 May 1996 amending Decision 89/540/EEC on the organization of a temporary experiment on the marketing of seeds and propagating material (Text with EEA relevance) (96/336/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 3 of Decision 89/540/EEC '30 June 1996` is replaced by '30 June 1997`.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
